content.question: All of the following statements about Milosz are factually correct. Which one would be most useful in identifying the intended audience of The Captive Mind ?

choices.label: Milosz was born in present-day Lithuania and throughout his life professed to have a dual identity as both a Lithuanian and a Pole.
Milosz worked as a diplomat for the Communist government of postwar Poland between 1946 and 1951.
Milosz defected to the West in 1951 and obtained political asylum in France.
Milosz emigrated to the United States in 1960 and became a professor at the University of California, Berkeley.

content.answer: Milosz defected to the West in 1951 and obtained political asylum in France.
